io.spine.server.event

Class EventException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • io.spine.server.event.EventException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.spine.core.MessageRejection, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InvalidEventException, UnsupportedEventException

    public abstract class EventException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
implements io.spine.core.MessageRejection
    A base for exceptions related to events.
